name: England
about: England can be one of the best place for study law. Many students parsue their law study in England and practice there. Intern opportunities are availabe for medical student as well. The acceptenece ratio is almost 78% for intern applications

name: USA
about: USA can be one of the best place for science backgrounds. Many students parsue their post-graduation and work there. Intern opportunities are availabe for after the graduation and mosy importantly they are paid. The acceptenece ratio is almost 88% for intern applications

name: Germany
about: For digital nomad accross europe it can be best place for intern applications. In recent years germany had been going through the shortage of skilled persons on the Information technology field

name: Canada
about: Its not easy to get interns in canada if you are not from canada, usa or any europien countries. But its possible to get interns or jobs if you are highly skilled, or you have severel years of experience on related field
